description: With an ultra-slim profile, the stylish HP 2711x monitor looks perfect on any desktop and takes up minimal space. This monitor delivers Full HD viewing with less glare and easily connects to desktop or notebook PCs. It also has an HDMI input so you can connect to a TV or other video source. Tilt and slide adjustments give you a comfortable view, and QuickView modes are optimized to match screen performance with the content of your choice.
title: HP 2711x 27-Inch LED Monitor - Black
